product_name: Nike Reflective Element Half-Zip Top - Women's
long_description: Made with stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric, the women's Nike Element Reflective Half-Zip Running Top uses reflective features to help you stand out even when the light is low. Dri-FIT(R) fabric wicks sweat away from skin and dries quickly to help keep you comfortable during intense exercise. Mock neck zips up to the chin for coverage when it's cold. Raglan shoulder seams enhance natural movement. Stretchy elastic cuffs with thumbholes extend over top of hands to keep wrists warm. The women's Nike Element Reflective Half-Zip Running Top features flat seams that minimize chafing.
short_description: Made with stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric, the women's Nike Element Reflective Half-Zip Running Top uses reflective features to help you stand out even when the light is low.
